name.baseName: Alumina production ; Alumina for metallurgy ; Bauxite ; 2012
氧化铝生产; 冶金用氧化铝 ; 铝土矿 ; 2012年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The production of alumina described in this data set is specifically used for metallurgical purposes. It pertains to the processing of bauxite into alumina in the year 2012. This type of alumina is typically utilized in the production of aluminum metal via the Hall-Héroult process. It serves as a critical raw material for the aluminum industry and is used in the fabrication of various aluminum products such as foil, structural materials, automotive parts, and electrical conductors.
本数据集描述的氧化铝生产专门用于冶金目的。它涉及2012年将铝土矿加工成氧化铝的过程。这种氧化铝通常用于通过霍尔-埃鲁法生产铝金属。它作为铝工业的关键原料，用于制造各种铝制品，如箔、结构材料、汽车零部件和电导线。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The production of alumina described in this data set is specifically used for metallurgical purposes. It pertains to the processing of bauxite into alumina in the year 2012. This type of alumina is typically utilized in the production of aluminum metal via the Hall-Héroult process. It serves as a critical raw material for the aluminum industry and is used in the fabrication of various aluminum products such as foil, structural materials, automotive parts, and electrical conductors.
本数据集描述的氧化铝生产专门用于冶金目的。它涉及2012年将铝土矿加工成氧化铝的过程。这种氧化铝通常用于通过霍尔-埃鲁法生产铝金属。它作为铝工业的关键原料，用于制造各种铝制品，如箔、结构材料、汽车零部件和电导线。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), users should consider the following: Ensure that the scope of your LCA corresponds with the metallurgical application of alumina. The data set provides information on primary aluminum (PA), secondary aluminum (SA), electricity, and other relevant background information from 2012, and should be used for historical assessments or as a baseline for improvements in processes over time. Be aware that the SA data is largely derived from published literature, while PA data comes from statistical sources. Background data is drawn from the CAS RCEES 2018 database, which includes localized LCA data for China. Methodologies mentioned in those data sources should be followed, and the technological applicability should reflect the standards and practices of the Chinese aluminum industry during the year 2012.

在使用本数据集进行生命周期评估(LCA)时，用户应考虑以下事项：确保您的LCA范围与氧化铝的冶金应用相对应。数据集提供了2012年的一级铝(PA)、二级铝(SA)、电力和其他相关的背景信息，应用于历史评估或作为随时间过程改进的基准。请注意，SA数据主要来自已发表的文献，而PA数据来自统计来源。背景数据取自CAS RCEES 2018数据库，其中包括中国本地化的LCA数据。应遵循上述数据来源中提到的方法论，并且技术适用性应反映2012年中国铝行业的标准和实践。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
